tutorial: 4. Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: Now that we have a formula for a fixed stop loss target, it shouldn't be hard to come up with the formula for the take profit target!

paragraphs.text:
We just need to subtract 10% to the entry target rate node's value:

tradingEngine.current.
position.entryTargetRate.value * 0.9
Use the above for the Phase #1 take profit formula!
We are done with the manage stage!
